sales.name: Toobydoo Summer Apparel
sales.description: Pay no heed to the playful name — Toobydoo's children’s clothes offer some spectacularly refined pieces for boys and girls. The threads here are perfect for summertime fun: Choose from shirt dresses and ruffled skirts for girls, and graphic tees and striped polos for boys.

sales.name: The Land of Nod: Bedding & Furniture
sales.description: The fall collection from The Land of Nod (a Crate and Barrel company) is a feast for the eyes. These hand-picked items aren't even in stores or online yet! Decorate your little one's room with adorable bedding, chairs, wall art, rugs, and curtains. Visit our Gilt Little Inspirations blog for a collage of our top picks.

sales.name: Missoni Home: Rugs & Furniture
sales.description: Rife with the bold prints and vibrant color combinations this Italian brand is known for, each of Missoni’s floor coverings and furniture pieces is enough to define an entire room. The selection here is whimsical and inspiring, from a hand-tufted rug in a petal motif, to a spool-shaped table. Want to bring the style outside? Don’t miss the outdoor options (we particularly love the Regista folding deck chair, shown above, with its jacquard-woven seat and back covers).

sales.name: Missoni Home: Pillows, Poufs & More
sales.description: The perfect finishing touch for a room, Missoni’s pillows and poufs are rife with personality. Just a few scattered about will give your space oh-so-Italian flair.

sales.name: Judith Ripka Jewelry
sales.description: Judith Ripka is known for her bright, clean designs, and this collection is proof perfect of why she's one of our jewelry team's favorite designers. The pieces they've put together here have serious sparkle: Think colorful stones like turquoise and amethyst nestled in textured pendants and rings. For glam without the bright hues, choose from white sapphire pendants and cuffs.

sales.name: Badgley Mischka & Mark + James
sales.description: Mark Badgley and James Mischka have long been celebrated for their red-carpet dresses and enchanting bridal gowns. And their diffusion line, which is full of sexy, cocktail-length numbers and elegant, floor-sweeping designs, is equally exquisite. In this sale you'll find glittering, fluid silhouettes covered entirely in paillettes; ruched and ruffled pieces in deep jewel tones; and intricately beaded slips crafted from delicate mesh.

sales.name: Summer Staples: Canvas Sneakers
sales.description: Sure, leather and suede are great, but when the summer’s in full swing, there’s nothing quite like a pair of classic canvas kicks. Which is exactly why we’ve pulled together this selection of seasonally appropriate sneakers in an array of styles. Go ahead, take your pick.

sales.name: Jamie Young Home Accents
sales.description: Design and choice of materials give Jamie Young's inspired collection of furnishings, textiles, and lighting an updated-Americana feel. There’s something rustic and handcrafted about them, an aesthetic that connects them to a bygone era and place — yet, at the same time, they possess a fresh, contemporary look.

sales.name: Buyer's Picks: Vases
sales.description: A grouping of vases makes a stylish design statement — but remember that the art is all in the mix. Group together different heights, colors, prints, and textures for a truly curated feel. Why not start with picks from this inspired selection? (Bonus: All are priced at major discounts.)

sales.name: The Land of Nod: Bedding & Furniture
sales.description: The fall collection from The Land of Nod (a Crate and Barrel company) is a feast for the eyes. These hand-picked items aren't even in stores or online yet! Decorate your little one's room with adorable bedding, chairs, wall art, rugs, and curtains. Visit our Gilt Little Inspirations blog for a collage of our top picks.

sales.name: New & Noteworthy
sales.description: From clothing to footwear, accessories, and more, we’ve got everything you need to stay stylish this summer in our encyclopedic sale. And with an array of great brands on offer, we’ll understand if you can’t pick just one piece from the massive selection.

sales.name: Wimbledon Style
sales.description: With everything from trim polo shirts and track jackets to smart blazers, cardigans, and chinos, this sale has the best of classic tennis style for both on and off the court. Pick up something stylish for your trip across the pond to Wimbledon (you are going, aren’t you?) or just the trip to the corner store.

sales.name: Vintage Vault: Designer Handbags & Jewelry
sales.description: Vintage bags and jewelry are having a major moment right now, and our buyers have unearthed some can't-miss pieces that truly exemplify the look. Today’s carefully curated selection includes plenty of covetable vintage treasures, from shoulder bags and satchels to drop earrings and pendant necklaces by the likes of Hermès, Chanel, and more. Pick your poison!

sales.name: Top Gear: Prince Lionheart, Inglesina & More
sales.description: A one-stop shop for new parents, including strollers, stroller liners, diaper bags, car seats, and more.

sales.name: Missoni Home: Bath & Robes
sales.description: These bath and beach towels are hallmarked by the energetic, wavy stripes that are this Italian brand’s signature. On offer are a variety of color stories, from neutrals to something a little brighter. Flower-shaped bath mats and plush robes lend a luxury-resort flavor.

sales.name: Plenty by Tracy Reese
sales.description: No matter the season, we love Tracy Reese's feminine aesthetic. And this particular selection from her secondary line, Plenty, will add just the right amount of whimsy to your summer style. Circle skirts and silk blouses make for perfect pairings, and the brightly printed dresses will add a playful wink to basic wardrobes.

sales.name: Classic Kicks
sales.description: Our collection of easygoing sneakers runs the gamut from canvas to suede to leather, but these picks all have one thing in common: They look great now, and they’ll look even better a few seasons down the line.

sales.name: Mason's & Gilded Age
sales.description: From rugged jeans by Gilded Age to trim, tailored cargo pants by Mason’s, this sale has a little bit of everything you need this summer. Stock up on tees, shorts, swimwear, knits, and more from two labels that specialize in stylish casualwear.

sales.name: I. Miller by Delman
sales.description: In the 1920s and the decades that followed, I. Miller shoes were seen on stylish feet all over the world. For this fun sale, renowned shoe brand Delman, who produced the I. Miller line back in the day, has recreated I. Miller designs exclusively for Gilt.com. Think chic quilted ballet flats with contrasting cap-toes, and solid styles in neutral metallic and cool patent leather — and you won't find them anywhere but here. Want to know more? Read I. Miller by Delman: The Colorful History Behind the Shoes on Gilt Insider.

sales.name: Missoni Home: Bedding
sales.description: Energize your master suite with Missoni’s inimitably vibrant designs. The brand’s iconic wavy lines, as well as a plethora of other eye-pleasing prints, are in evidence in the blankets, duvets, throws, and decorative pillows on offer here. Don’t be afraid to mix and match prints; make your bed a canvas for great design.

sales.name: Sunday Night Steals
sales.description: It’s Sunday night. The weekend is nearly over. But don’t despair — we’ve got a selection of top-notch gear to bring a little bit of extra joy to your evening. Scoop up a steal now and start your week off right.

sales.name: Restock Your Closet
sales.description: Whether you’re looking to completely rebuild your wardrobe or just fill a few important gaps in your repertoire, we’ve got you covered in this sale. Stock up on stylish picks from a host of great brands, and take on the season in top form.

sales.name: The Bracelet Watch Feat. Swiss Army
sales.description: We love when a practical accessory can double as a stylish statement. Take the bracelet watch. You'll find many iterations in this sale, starring iconic brand Swiss Army: borrowed-from-the-boys men's timepieces; sporty chronographs; and elegant rose gold styles — each so chic you may find yourself planning your outfit around your watch.

sales.name: Travel the World: Books for Kids
sales.description: Adventure-seeking kids and nostalgic parents alike will want to snap up this selection of beloved kids' books. Miroslav Sasek's playful illustrations and delightful narratives introduce little ones to interesting people, places, and customs in cities all over the world, from New York to London to Australia.

sales.name: Up to 80% Off: Home Decor
sales.description: Maybe you’ve had a little redecoration on your mind, but you aren’t sure where to start — nor do you want to spend a lot. We’ve got you covered with this wide selection of inspired home accents for virtually every room and style. And all come at major discounts, so you'll barely be cutting into your summer budget.

sales.name: Terrace Essentials
sales.description: When outfitting a small outdoor space, it’s key to choose pieces with both form and function (not one or the other), and plenty of attention to scale — a huge coffee table or oversize lounge chair won’t do. We’ve curated a selection of terrace-perfect furnishings and accents that includes colorful chairs and ottomans, compact tables, sleek stainless-steel tiki torches, and more.

sales.name: Summer Sunday Steals
sales.description: Want to score of-the-moment summer styles by some of your favorite designer names for less? This inspired mix of essential pumps, dresses, tops, and accessories from some of our favorite designer names makes dressing for the warm weather a total breeze. Happy Sunday!

sales.name: Summer Style: Joe's Jeans & More
sales.description: Lightweight tees, jeans, and jean shorts that will keep kids cool as the weather heats up.

sales.name: What to Wear to a BBQ
sales.description: You may not have a personal stylist on speed dial, but this sale makes it easy to look fierce at all the summer barbecues on your calendar. Take a cue from our stylists, who’ve rounded up a selection of the season's best styles: wrap dresses, cotton rompers, denim cut-offs, breezy maxis, and summery prints. Did someone say something about firing up the grill?

sales.name: Summer Sunday Steals: Pumps
sales.description: Want to score of-the-moment summer styles by some of your favorite designer names for less? This inspired mix of essential pumps, dresses, tops, and accessories from some of our favorite designer names makes dressing for the warm weather a total breeze. Happy Sunday!

sales.name: The Bracelet Watch Feat. Swiss Army
sales.description: From bold chronometers by Red Line to classic field watches from Swiss Army, this sale has something to suit every taste. Get a great timepiece now and keep time in style all summer long.

sales.name: Last Chance: Fourth of July
sales.description: Red, white, and blue is one of our favorite color combos for kids — it's bold but adorable at the same time, and although the nautical look is seasonal, it never goes out of style. The dresses, polo shirts, shorts, and shoes here will prep kids for July 4th, plus, they can wear them all summer long. Visit our Gilt Little Inspirations blog to see which top looks our buyer selected.

sales.name: Beach Bonfire Essentials
sales.description: What’s better than spending a day at the beach? Spending a night at the beach — and we’ve got just the right wardrobe for the occasion. Our bonfire-inspired picks include cozy cashmere ponchos and cool striped cardigans, gorgeous knit sweaters, and superchic sweatpants. Add a fire and some marshmallows, and you’re all set!

sales.name: Up to 80% Off: Home Decor
sales.description: Maybe you’ve had a little redecoration on your mind, but you aren’t sure where to start — nor do you want to spend a lot. We’ve got you covered with this wide selection of inspired home accents for virtually every room and style. And all come at major discounts, so you'll barely be cutting into your summer budget.

sales.name: Whit
sales.description: After honing her design skills at Kate Spade and Steven Alan, Arizona-born Whitney Pozgay branched out on her own to launch Whit, a whimsical line of tanks, tops, dresses, and more. Playful is the key word when it comes to this unique collection — so enjoy choosing from an array of dresses boasting frisky patterns and pretty adornments, like puff sleeves and satin ruffles.

sales.name: Steve&James Outdoor Furniture
sales.description: Modern, elegant, and durable, Steve&James furniture is designed to withstand the elements, with materials like aluminum frames, all-weather fabric, and UV-protected rattan. Versatility is also the name of the game: Reconfigure the modular Vicky sofa to suit your needs (and your patio's size).

sales.name: Mini Rodini
sales.description: Scandinavia-based Mini Rodini lets kids wear clothes that cater to their creativity, imagination, and style. The T-shirts, shorts, and more here feature playful designs that we can't get enough of (the "Wild at Heart" tee = amazing). Mini Rodini also strives to be sustainable, and we love that, too!

sales.name: Get Color Underfoot: Rizzy Rugs
sales.description: Amplify the overall design of virtually any room in your home with these colorful rugs. Rizzy’s love of print is evident in this selection (one of our favorites is the Platoon, with its honeycomb-like motif). Choose from neutrals or bolder hues. And these floor coverings’ ultra-durable construction means you don’t have to baby them.

sales.name: Wardrobe Essentials: Everything You Need
sales.description: Meet the components of classic, versatile style: the silk dress, the shell, the summer skirt, white watch, the stud earring, and the work shoe.

sales.name: Wendy Bellissimo Boys' Apparel
sales.description: We're super-excited that famed baby and children's designer Wendy Bellissimo has chosen to launch her latest baby clothes collection exclusively on Gilt Baby & Kids. The layettes and little outfits are to die for — think tiered ruffled skirts with matching tops and adorable vests and sweaters for little guys. Read Wendy's touching story on our Gilt Little Inspirations blog.

sales.name: Jayson Home Furniture & Accessories
sales.description: Imbue your interior design with depth and texture, courtesy of this Chicago home-goods haven's furniture and accents. The tables and seating pieces, many of which are antiques, set the tone beautifully. Top-flight materials like natural horn and mother-of-pearl mark the serving pieces and tableware. And if you're a candle lover, stock up on the richly textured votive holders with antique gold and silver overlays.

sales.name: Wendy Bellissimo Girls' Apparel
sales.description: We're super-excited that famed baby and children's designer Wendy Bellissimo has chosen to launch her latest baby clothes collection exclusively on Gilt Baby & Kids. The layettes and little outfits are to die for — think tiered ruffled skirts with matching tops and adorable vests and sweaters for little guys. Read Wendy's touching story on our Gilt Little Inspirations blog.

sales.name: Modern Elements: Fireplaces
sales.description: These sleek, innovative ventless fireplaces (for indoors, outdoors, or both) burn ethanol, a clean, renewable source of energy. But beyond that, they also bring plenty of sleek style to any room. Go for a classic square- or rectangular-shaped model, or pick out something a little edgier, like one of our favorites, the triangular Quantum.

sales.name: Amelia: European Kids' Clothing
sales.description: This timeless collection of kids' clothes from Amelia, the European favorite that started in Milan in 2004, is made from the most comfortable textiles and boasts intricate details, including hand-stitching and shirring. Beautiful and refined, today’s showcase includes dresses and tops in adorable prints, solid and patterned overalls, and more.

sales.name: Melissa & Doug: Trunki & Travel Toys
sales.description: Melissa and Doug Bernstein first made wooden puzzles in their garage two decades ago. Today, they’re one of the country’s leading manufacturers of educational toys. You’ll love this selection of our favorites, including the Trunki, a ride-on toy filled with fun travel playthings.

sales.name: The Basics Shop: Feat. 2(x)ist Underwear
sales.description: When it comes to building a great wardrobe, start with the basics. We've got a selection of go-to pieces here — from underwear and socks to shirts and shoes — that’ll set you on the road to a properly outfitted closet.

sales.name: The Boys' Shop
sales.description: Rough-and-tumble boys can wear out their outfits quickly, and our team kept that in mind when we chose this selection of boys' clothes (let the summer fun begin!). Everything in this sale can stand up to the ultimate level of wear and tear.

sales.name: The Girls' Shop
sales.description: From swimsuits to shoes, this sale is packed with some of our favorite looks for girls. And since this bunch includes both versatile neutrals and playful brights, she'll have plenty to choose from no matter her style.

sales.name: Baby Boutique
sales.description: Parents, meet your secret weapon: From naptime to mealtime to playtime — and any other time you can think of — this sale has you covered. Adorable baby clothes, toys, and furniture are just some of the must-haves you'll find in this array from our favorite baby brands. We have chic maternity clothes for moms, too!

sales.name: Fine Jewelry Personal Shopping
sales.description:
Our Fine Jewelry Personal Shopping team is now available to offer one-on-one assistance in finding everything from classic investment pieces to one-of-a-kind designs not currently available on Gilt.com. To give you some idea of the kinds of gorgeous gems to which we have access, we’ve rounded up an amazing array of finds for your perusing pleasure, including multi-gem earrings, museum-worthy necklaces, and diamonds galore.

Looking for something you don’t see here? Contact our Personal Jewelry Shopping team at jewelryrequests@gilt.com or (855) 758-3765.
